member.name: M:EquipmentAutomation.FrmVoltageTest.ByteArrayToHexString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Converts an array of bytes into a formatted string of hex digits (ex: E4 CA B2)
member.param: The array of bytes to be translated into a string of hex digits.
member.returns: Returns a well formatted string of hex digits with spacing.

member.name: P:EquipmentAutomation.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager

member.name: P:EquipmentAutomation.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
